title: Obtain the Sinner
text: My name is Pacassi... I'm an orphan of the old generation, a walking contaminant. Please keep your distance.

title: Raise to Phase 1
text: Energy level boosted. Please upgrade your radiation protection accordingly.

title: Raise to Phase 3
text: You still haven't given up... Then, touch me... and prepare to be pierced through by radiation.

title: Level Start
text: I won't let you down.

title: Win Battles
text: I did it.

title: Lose Battles
text: Sorry... I'm sorry...

title: Ultimate Skill
text: Get away... from me!

title: Die in Battles
text: At last... it's over.

title: Greeting
text: Hello, Chief. Do you have any work for me today?

title: Conversation 1
text: Is there anything I can help with, Chief? I'm not used to staying idle and doing nothing.

title: Conversation 2
text: The modification on this arm is to help the muscles exert force... Sorry, but please don't touch it. No, it's not forbidden. It's just that... it has absorbed too much radiation.

title: Conversation 3
text: I must live on, and remember everything that happened in the town. Otherwise, everything we'd experienced will be meaningless...

title: Special Conversation 1
text: I still remember the last accident with the power station. That winter, the snow ruined the greater part of the grid. In thirty days, the town's population reduced by a quarter. We only found them under the melted snow when the spring came the next year...

title: Special Conversation 2
text: Mayek means lighthouse. Even in the darkest hour, it provides the wanderers with guidance and hope. But no one knows, that even the lighthouse itself can be devoured by darkness...

title: Special Conversation 3
text: I never dream of pity from others, not even from you. I... don't want to live without dignity, as an experimental subject or an exotic animal on display...

title: Full Compliance
text: No one has ever told me what friendship means... I've read it in a book, that a friend is someone you would die for... If that's true, then you're my friend, my only friend.

title: Idle
text: ...You've been working for hours, Chief. Don't you want to take a break?

title: Annoyed
text: Chief... Is this... how people in the DisCity show friendliness? Hmm... Okay.

title: Special Attention
text: Could you... stop staring at me? I... I'm not very used to it.

title: Dispatch
text: I'll get it done.

title: Dispatch Complete
text: I've finished my work. Please give me a new task.

title: Level Up
text: The radiation has become stronger.

title: Join Team
text: I'm used to battles. I can certainly do it.

title: Attire Obtained
text: Chief, please move closer to the fire. Even the outskirts of Mayek are much colder than DisCity. Take care and stay warm.

title: Greeting
text: Chief, do you feel warmer now? If you're still feeling cold... have some of the borscht I've just cooked.

title: Ordinary Contact 1
text: "A hundred years have passed. The young city has become the treasure and marvel of the Northern nation..." I found this poetry collection in Bureau's library. It's very interesting... Care to read it, Chief?

title: Ordinary Contact 2
text: This was once the furthest I'd been from Mayek. And now... it's also the closest I've been to it.

title: Idle
text: When I was little, I always hoped winter could pass sooner. But now, I wish it could stay longer... Human beings are indeed strange.

title: Annoyed
text: I... I only added some Mayek-style cutting and materials to the uniform. I suppose... I haven't violated the Bureau's rules, have I...?

title: Level Up
text: Hmm, it's very warm.

title: Special Attention
text: Bone-chilling winds and snowy nights are unique to Mayek, and those who stand firm in winter nights in snow gear deserve to stay in our memories eternally too...
